# Getting Started with _quanyu_

This vignette introduces the **quanyu** package — an R package developed for _ETC5523 Assignment 4_.
This short vignette demonstrates how to use the quanyu package.

🧩 Load the package
```r
library(quanyu)
```


🔍 View the dataset
```r

head(se_fire_monthly)

```

🚀 Launch the Shiny app
```r
run_app()

```



This app allows you to explore the relationship between Fire Weather Index (FWI) and burned area interactively.
